TopicTitle: Camera Bug in KSP 1.11.1 PC Windows

Articles.Content:
I found a bug in KSP Windows 1.11.1. Occasionally the camera won’t be kvable by the arrows or the mouse, to fix this you have to make a save and reload that save. And ipomce it occurs it can occur many times.

 

Game: Kerbal Space Program

Running on: Windows 10

Update: 1.11.1

Launcher: STEAM

Issue: Camera will sometimes not move when using the mouse or arrow keys. This does not happen that often but when the bug has already appeared it will continue to show up it will happen again and again. 

How to Fix  Temporally:  Save your game and then reloading it.

Edited March 11, 2021 by Dr. Kerbal
